20110118014634.000|20110118014634.000|CC1|  to help significantly improve 
20110118014634.000|20110118014637.000|CC1|         lung function.         
20110118014637.000|20110118014639.000|CC1|  Unlike most COPD medications, 
20110118014639.000|20110118014639.000|CC1|         VAVAIR contains        
20110118014639.000|20110118014642.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20110118014642.000|20110118014642.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20110118014642.000|20110118014643.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20110118014643.000|20110118014645.000|CC1|        working together        
20110118014645.000|20110118014645.000|CC1|         to help improve        
20110118014645.000|20110118014647.000|CC1|   your lung function all day.  
20110118014647.000|20110118014647.000|CC1|      ADVAIR won't replace      
20110118014647.000|20110118014649.000|CC1|      fast-acting inhalers      
20110118014649.000|20110118014651.000|CC1|       for sudden symptoms      
20110118014651.000|20110118014651.000|CC1|     and should not be used     
20110118014651.000|20110118014653.000|CC1|     more than twice a day.     
20110118014653.000|20110118014653.000|CC1|        People with COPD        
20110118014653.000|20110118014655.000|CC1|          taking ADVAIR         
20110118014655.000|20110118014655.000|CC1|        may have a higher       
20110118014655.000|20110118014657.000|CC1|      chance of pneumonia.      
20110118014657.000|20110118014657.000|CC1|    ADVAIR may increase your    
20110118014657.000|20110118014700.000|CC1|      risk of osteoporosis
